about_the_game:
Supporter Pack was created for those players who want to support me in the development of First Day.

Items from this DLC will be rotated every few months, and DLC owners will receive new exclusive items.
Attention! After each subsequent update, it will no longer be possible to obtain items from the previous collection! Thus, players who supported the development of the game in the early stages will receive the largest number of unique bonuses!
All items that will be obtained by the owners of this DLC are exclusive and cannot be obtained in any other way.
However, owners of old collections, if they wish, can sell their items to those who wish to purchase them on the official Steam marketplace.
Some items are unique variations of the items found in the base game but have their own history, appearance, and stats.
Items obtained from this expansion may provide some relief in the early days of the game, but do not have a significant impact on the later stages of the game.
The main purpose of creating these unique items is to thank you for your invaluable support!

Supporter Pack Collections of Unique Items:

The second collection - the set of "Green Brotherhood"
The Green Brotherhood is an international group that existed before the nuclear war.
The roots of the Green Brotherhood grow out of Greenpeace, when several members of this organization decided that nothing could be changed in this world through peaceful means, they left Greenpeace and founded the Green Brotherhood. The Green Brotherhood very quickly gained popularity among young people, and the main rule of their code was "Everyone who does not want to be kind deserves to die." Much is known about the affairs of the Green Brotherhood, but the most popular and loud of them is "WC" - World Clear, the dropping of nuclear bombs on 420 military installations around the world, which ultimately led to the outbreak of a world nuclear war.

Kit includes:
  • Rifle
  • Headdress
  • Backpack
  • Glasses
  • Armor
  • Pants
  • Mask
  • Shoes

The first collection - the set of "Snow Leopards" (no longer available)
Snow Leopards is an international group that existed before the nuclear war.
The purpose of the existence of the Snow Leopards was the fight against corrupt officials and the elimination of nuclear weapons.
In the last years before the nuclear war, the Snow Leopards were especially active in nuclear disarmament. On their account, there are dozens of defused atomic bombs, as well as hundreds of eliminated criminals who were involved in corruption and the sale of atomic weapons.

Kit includes:
  • Rifle
  • Knife
  • Headdress
  • Backpack
  • Glasses
  • Armor
  • Pants
  • Mask
  • Shoes
